values: A cloud is a group of water drops in the sky.
The sky was filled with white clouds.

n.云，云状物，云状的烟，阴影，vt.使…模糊，以云遮敝，笼罩，使…混淆，毁坏，vi.脸色显得阴沉

To cloud is to obscure or make something unclear or confusing.
A cloud is a visible mass of water droplets or ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere.
